snippets.ull: ul>li[id=${1} class=${2}]*2{ Will work with html, pug, haml and slim }
snippets.oll: 1. Will only work in html
snippets.ran: { Wrap plain text in curly braces }
snippets.ogp: meta[property="og:type" content=""]+meta[property="og:url" content=""]+meta[property="og:title" content=""]+meta[property="og:image" content=""]+meta[property="og:description" content=""]+meta[property="og:site_name" content=""]+meta[property="og:locale" content="ja_JP"]+meta[property="og:image:width" content="1200"]+meta[property="og:image:height" content="630"]+meta[name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image"]+meta[name="twitter:site" content=""]+meta[name="twitter:url" content=""]+meta[name="twitter:title" content=""]+meta[name="twitter:description" content=""]+meta[name="twitter:image" content=""]
snippets.doc: html[lang=${lang}]>(head>meta[charset=UTF-8]+meta[name="keywords" content=""]+meta[name="description" content=""]+meta[http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge"]+meta[name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"]+link+link[rel="icon" type="image/png" href=""]+title{${1:Document}})+body
